## Getting Started


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, ggstatsplot)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exam <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(1234)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gghistostats(
  data = exam,
  x = ENGLISH, 
  type = 'parametric',
  test.value = 60, 
  bin.args = list(color = "black",
                  fill = "grey50",
                  alpha = 0.7), 
  normal.curve = FALSE,
  normal.curve.args = list(linewidth 
= 2), 
  xlab = "English scores"
)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](in-class_Ex4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gghistostats(
  data = exam,
  x = ENGLISH, 
  type = 'np',
  test.value = 60, 
  bin.args = list(color = "black",
                  fill = "grey50",
                  alpha = 0.7), 
  normal.curve = FALSE,
  normal.curve.args = list(linewidth 
= 2), 
    xlab = "English scores"
)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](in-class_Ex4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p <- gghistostats(
  data = exam,
  x = ENGLISH, 
  type = 'np',
  test.value = 60, 
  bin.args = list(color = "black",
                  fill = "grey50",
                  alpha = 0.7), 
  normal.curve = FALSE,
  normal.curve.args = list(linewidth 
= 2), 
    xlab = "English scores"
)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
extract_stats(p)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
  gghistostats(
  data = exam,
  x = ENGLISH, 
  type = 'bayes',
  test.value = 60, 
  bin.args = list(color = "black",
                  fill = "grey50",
                  alpha = 0.7), 
  normal.curve = FALSE,
  normal.curve.args = list(linewidth = 2), 
  xlab = "English scores"
)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](in-class_Ex4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggdotplotstats(
  data = exam,
  x = ENGLISH, 
  y = CLASS,
  title = "",
  xlab = ""
  
)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](in-class_Ex4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exam_long <- exam %>%
   pivot_longer(
     cols = ENGLISH:SCIENCE,
     names_to = "SUBJECT",
     values_to = "SCORES") %>%
  filter(CLASS =="3A")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggwithinstats(
    data = filter(exam_long,
                SUBJECT %in%
                  c("MATHS", "SCIENCE")),
  x    = SUBJECT,
  y    = SCORES,
  type = "p"
)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](in-class_Ex4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggscatterstats(
  data = exam,
  x = MATHS,
  y = ENGLISH, 
  marginal = TRUE, 
  label.var = ID,
  label.expression = ENGLISH >90 & MATHS  > 90,
)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](in-class_Ex4_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
